item.title: Video Editor for Webinar Recordings and Small Video Projects - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor to edit and crop our webinar recordings, enhance their visual appeal, and handle small video projects as needed. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, creative flair, and the ability to deliver high-quality videos in a timely manner.

Compensation/Hours: Up to $50/hour, up to 20 hours/month on a rolling basis

Responsibilities:
Edit and crop webinar recordings to ensure clarity and engagement.
Enhance video quality through color correction, sound editing, and adding visual effects.
Create visually appealing intros, outros, and transitions for our videos.
Collaborate with our team to understand project requirements and deliver videos that meet our standards.
Handle various small video projects, including promotional videos, social media clips, and tutorials.
Ensure all videos align with our brand guidelines and maintain a consistent style.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a portfolio showcasing your work.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Strong understanding of video formats, codecs, and resolutions.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.
Attention to detail and a strong sense of aesthetics.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience editing webinar recordings or similar content.
Basic graphic design skills.

How to Apply:
If you are a talented Video Editor looking for a freelance opportunity with a creative and dynamic company, we would love to hear from you!

Please submit your application with the following:
Your resume/CV.
A link to your portfolio or samples of your work.


Hourly Range: $50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Promotional Video, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Digital Video, Promotional Video, Corporate Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Events / Wedding Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced Wedding Video Editor

Description:

We are seeking a talented and experienced Wedding Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of editing successful wedding videos and a strong portfolio showcasing their work in the event space. If you have a passion for capturing the magic of special occasions and transforming footage into memorable videos, we want to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

Edit wedding videos to create high-quality, engaging, and memorable content.
Collaborate with clients to understand their vision and ensure it is reflected in the final product.
Use Frame.io for seamless video review and collaboration.
Attend weekly meetings to discuss project progress, client feedback, and new assignments.
Train on new clients and projects, particularly those within the wedding industry.
Maintain and update project spreadsheets for efficient workflow management.
Requirements:

Proven experience in editing wedding videos; experience with event-style editing (e.g., bar mitzvahs, quinceañeras, nightclub events) is also welcome.
Proficiency in using Frame.io and spreadsheet tools.
Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with clients and team members.
Availability to attend weekly meetings and participate in ongoing training.
A portfolio of past work, including samples of wedding videos or similar event editing projects.
Application Instructions:

Please submit the following with your application:

A resume highlighting your relevant experience.
A cover letter explaining your interest in the position and your experience with wedding and event video editing.
Examples of past wedding videos or event editing projects (e.g., bar mitzvahs, quinceañeras, weddings, nightclub events). Note: Only applicants who submit video samples will be considered for an interview.
To Apply:

If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about creating stunning wedding videos, please submit your application and samples of your work. We look forward to reviewing your portfolio and potentially setting up an interview.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Photo Slideshow, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

We need a pro that can help us preparing primarily video mockups with motion like the following one:

item.title: Direct Response Ad Creatives Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled direct response based video editor to create engaging ad creatives for our clients doing upwards of $1 million/ month.

The ideal candidate should have experience in editing video content specifically for ads that go live on Facebook or Google.

The primary responsibility will be to transform raw footage and scripts into ad creatives/ videos that align with the brand's messaging and objectives and would be ready to publish inside the ad account.

Start the application with 'video' if you read this

We will shortlist candidates and ask them to carry out a short trial, which if done well, will mean we can work together long-term.

Apply with any direct response-related ad creatives you edited (ideally published on an ad account like Facebook or Google).

The editor should have a strong understanding of video storytelling, pacing, and visual effects to create captivating videos that drive engagement and conversions.

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months.

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: 4k Video Editor for Socials - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor for our fitness brand for a single video project, with potential for more. Currently, we do have editors for simpler content like our reels, shorts, and other social media videos. However, this is not the style or approach we need for this project. We need a pro for a marketing video called a Video Sales Letter (VSL).

The Video Sales Letter (VSL) is designed to close potential customers by having them book a call with us while watching it. This is a very important video and, as such, needs attention to detail and engaging graphics. This is a longer form video than any other but should represent our professionalism at the highest level.

The video is a single-camera, 20-minute-long pitch to potential customers. We will provide raw 4k footage, logos, branded color codes, royalty-free music, and even editing software. These will be uploaded to Google Drive. Any access to other software can be provided by us, such as captioning software, royalty-free b-roll sites, and editing software like; Adobe Premiere.

We are looking for the most engaging, professional, and exciting video to be created.

All those considered for the position will get paid to perform a test video of only a 2-minute edit. Whoever performs the best edit will get the project offered to them. The 2-minute demo will pay $40 for your time.

The perfect professional would know how to edit video/audio in a professional manner as well as make the content engaging.

There is potential for consistent work if this project is done well.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Elearning Video, Videography, Health & Fitness
Skills: Audio Editing, Elearning Video, Videography, Health & Fitness
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Explainer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, Please read full Job Post

I am looking for someone that can create simple, straight forward how-to tutorial videos. These topics spread from many keyword phrases like: 'How to, 'Tutorials' 'Which is Better' 'This Explained,' and many more. Focusing on worldwide trends and lots of interesting topics. You will be require to research the solution and record yourself talking about the solution while showing on a Computer or Phone. You need to be able to record your mobile or computer screen and add your voice over to explain certain steps to people. Some example topics are:

- How To Change Payment Account Google Play Store
- How To Change Country In Amazon Prime Video
- How to Transfer Instagram Account From One Phone to Another

With each topic you get an example video that explains to you all the steps, so you know how to do it too. You get paid $1 per minute, these videos are simple to make and need minimal editing. Most videos are between 1 to 3 minutes long. This is a long-term position and I need about 150 to 300 videos every single month. So you could easily earn $150 to $600 per month.

Disclaimer: I won't respond to any ChatGPT responses. When you apply please send a video sample so I can hear & see the quality of your microphone & camera.

If you believe you are a perfect candidate for this role, please reply with your favourite animal so we known you're read the job post. Once again, we will require a free sample of your work so we can move forward.

Requirements
-Fluent in English
-Camera
-Microphone
-Simple Editing Skills
-Simple Researching Skills
-Simple Script writing Skills

Examples from other Channels
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUJXjN_XRJ0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAcOdqjWeMo

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:18 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video
Skills: Explainer Video
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: DaVinci Resolve Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled DaVinci Resolve Video Editor to join our video production agency.

Please apply only if you have substantial experience editing with DaVinci Resolve.

We will select a few candidates for a trial project, which involves creating a 50-60 second BTS horizontal video. This trial will be compensated with a payment of $40.

To confirm that you have read this, please include "NORTHSTAR" at the beginning of your proposal.

We look forward to reviewing your work.







Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 19:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Sound Design
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Sound Design
Country: United Kingdom
